objective_and_summary.title: Objective & summary
objective_and_summary.description: I wish to begin my IOS developer career in your company and become team lead in 5 years. Experience in software development more than 3 years, I am working with swift and Xcode for 1.5 years. I also have experience in programming in C/C++, Java, SQL, worked in such graphic editors as Photoshop and Sketch. I have good analytical skills. Fast learning.

skills.title: Skills
skills.embedded_frameworks: Core Data, Core Location, Users notifications, Event Kit, UI Kit.
skills.third_party_frameworks: Google places, Google maps, Google distances, Firebase, Facebook API, Alamofire, SwiftyJSON, Snap Kit.

education.title: Education
courses: Online video-course UIKit Fundamentals by Udacity.
Online video-course Developing iOS 11 Apps with Swift by Paul Hegarty.

iOS_developing.name: Gym
iOS_developing.description: Developed program for finding gyms, filtering obtained data and providing services from gyms that are part of our system, such as payment of subscriptions, etc. The startup failed and the project closed.

iOS_developing.name: Speechify
iOS_developing.description: Developed share extension for capturing text from sites/PDFs, transferring it to main application and saving it to Core Data and Firebase. Experienced with creating view and contstraints programmatically.

iOS_developing.name: On Rad
iOS_developing.description: Developed design and functionality for application for sharing music and radio stations between app users. Experienced with REST API calls, Firebase, Alamofire, SwiftyJSON and Push Notifications.

iOS_developing.name: Road signs
iOS_developing.description: Developed a program for learning road signs.
